mapper.sql: ID, QUESTION, QUESTION_TYPE, GRADE, CATEGORY, PRIMARY_KEYWORD, ALTERNATE_KEYWORD, SEARCH_KEYWORD, KEYWORD_OPTION, SYNONYMS, ANSWER_SHAPE, ANSWER, REMARK, STATUS, ORIGINAL, MAP_SOURCE, MAP_ID, SYNC_FLAG, SYNC_TIME, CREATOR, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIER, MODIFICATION_DATE,ANSWER_MD5
mapper.insert: insert into KBS_QUESTION (ID, QUESTION, QUESTION_TYPE, GRADE, CATEGORY, PRIMARY_KEYWORD, ALTERNATE_KEYWORD, SEARCH_KEYWORD, KEYWORD_OPTION, SYNONYMS, ANSWER, REMARK, STATUS, ORIGINAL, MAP_SOURCE, MAP_ID, SYNC_FLAG, SYNC_TIME, CREATOR, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIER, MODIFICATION_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{primaryKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alternateKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{searchKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywordOption,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{synonyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syncFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update KBS_QUESTION
QUESTION = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIMARY_KEYWORD = #{primaryKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALTERNATE_KEYWORD = #{alternateKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEARCH_KEYWORD = #{searchKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEYWORD_OPTION = #{keywordOption,jdbcType=TINYINT},
SYNONYMS = #{synonyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ORIGINAL = #{original,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_SOURCE = #{mapSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_ID = #{mapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNC_FLAG = #{syncFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SYNC_TIME = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFICATION_DATE = #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update KBS_QUESTION set QUESTION = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUESTION_TYPE = #{questionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIMARY_KEYWORD = #{primaryKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALTERNATE_KEYWORD = #{alternateKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEARCH_KEYWORD = #{searchKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORD_OPTION = #{keywordOption,jdbcType=TINYINT}, SYNONYMS = #{synonyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ORIGINAL = #{original,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_SOURCE = #{mapSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_ID = #{mapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNC_FLAG = #{syncFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYNC_TIME = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFICATION_DATE = #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KBS_QUESTION ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first}, ${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_QUESTION WHERE CREATION_DATE >= #{lastCreateTime} LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_QUESTION WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE > CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_QUESTION WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE >= #{lastUpdateTime} ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
